Summary: Unknown Objects on Chalotte, NC Webcam
divs: sighting detailsi saw these objects on the charotte nc webcams last night. i did two screen shot captures and two objects that looked like disks hung around for 30 mins in the frames. i started with 22:30utc the 22:45 didn't come up but the 23:00 utc still shot did come up and the objects were still there so this shows that they were not planes. heres the link for the website and a link for the master airquality webcams. its very difficult for one person to watch them all. one note i'd like to make is that all of the texas webcams have been shut down! wonder what they don't want us to see? hum maybe the truth. http:\\maps.co.mecklenburg.nc.us\website\airquality\default.php?tab=visibility%20camera http:\\airnow.gov\index.cfm?action=airnow.webcams
